job_title: Postdoctoral Research Associate in Münster, North Rhine-Westphalia
pros: Researcher in Germany. Ok salary, no permanent position.
cons: Long waiting tiles towards administrative things and orders of materials.

job_title: Postdoctoral Fellow in Münster, North Rhine-Westphalia
pros: It's a nice place to work.
cons: As in most of the academic world, most of the positions are temporary.

job_title: Research Associate in Münster, North Rhine-Westphalia
pros: Gutes Arbeits Klima wie immer
cons: Pflege schwierig arbeit, zu wenig menschen

job_title: Research Assistant in Münster, North Rhine-Westphalia
pros: Positive pay Recommended Good environment
cons: Transportation Young population Defined positions

review_title: An above average and friendly university!
job_title: Postdoctoral Research Associate in Münster, North Rhine-Westphalia
pros: The university provides for a lot of extra-services and the personnel is generally very well mannered and throughout with their work.
cons: As with any university career wise is pretty stuck. As anywhere else It won't be easy to get a professorship or a permanent contract.
